landing.faq1q: How does StrideGuide protect my privacy?
landing.faq1a: All processing happens on your device. No camera frames leave your phone unless you explicitly opt-in to cloud features.
landing.faq2a: Yes. Core features like obstacle detection, guidance, and SOS work without any data connection.
landing.faq3a: Modern Android and iOS devices with camera access. Works best on devices from 2020 or newer.
landing.faq4a: Press and hold the SOS button. It sends SMS to your emergency contacts first, then can call if needed. Works without data.
landing.faq5a: English and French are fully supported with offline text-to-speech.
landing.faq6a: Email us at support@strideguide.ca or visit our help center.
landing.testimonial1: Finally, an app that actually works without internet. Perfect for my daily walks.
landing.testimonial2: The privacy approach is refreshing. I know my data stays on my device.
landing.testimonial3: Large buttons and clear audio make this so easy to use. Highly recommend.
